text: Klinkenberg is a village in the Dutch province of Gelderland. It is a part of the municipality of Buren, and lies about 8 km southwest of Veenendaal. The village Klinkenberg has a population of around 400.Statistics Netherlands (CBS), Statline: Kerncijfers wijken en buurten 2003-2005. As of January 1, 2005. The statistical area "Klinkenberg", which also can include the surrounding countryside, has a population of around 910. ==References== Category:Populated places in Gelderland Category:Buren
title: Klinkenberg, Gelderland
